title: Ticket #2419: CronJobMgr uses *this in constructor C4355
description:
/src/condor_utils/condor_job_mgr.cpp line 35ish: 
CronJobMgr::CronJobMgr( void )
        : m_job_list( *this ),
          m_name( NULL ),
          m_param_base( NULL ),
          m_params( NULL ),
          m_config_val_prog( NULL ),
          m_max_job_load( 0.2 ),
          m_cur_job_load( 0.0 ),
          m_schedule_timer( -1 )
{
}

Passing *this to m_job_list is dangerous. this is not safe in an initializer, as the object is not yet initialized. Refactor to avoid, probably by moving into the body of CronJobMgr::CronJobMgr()

MSDN on the warning
creator: adesmet
